concept.title: Metric Types
concept.shortdesc: You can use different metric types when you create a metric rule. The metric type determines which statistic triggers the alert.

conbody.p: metric rules and alertsmetric typesAfter selecting a metric type, you select the metric ID which specifies the metric to use. For example, a metric ID can be a runtime statistics gauge or a batch input records meter. You then select the metric element that defines what the metric is measuring. A metric element can be a count, rate, median, minimum, maximum, or percentage. The possible metric ID and metric element vary by metric type.
